about_the_game:
Background of the story:

  • Detective Iver investigates the case of a missing girl, and as the investigation deepens, he gets closer and closer to the truth. Unexpectedly, Iver is also in the hands of a mysterious organization, waiting for him to overcome the perilous situation. Can he get rid of all of this.

Gameplay elements:

  • The game is a third person action genre that includes shooting, melee, and puzzle solving.

  • There are different types of enemies in the game, and using different weapons can achieve twice the result with half the effort

  • Find weapons and ammunition to strengthen your arsenal

  • Search for different types of medication packs to restore blood volume or physical fitness

  • Maps can facilitate finding a way out

  • Collect task notes to understand the background of the story

  • Be careful of some traps

  • Use keys, passwords, etc. to unlock the corresponding levels

Author's supplement:

  • This is a game that I personally created during my leisure time

  • At present, the first chapter has been completed, and the plan is to complete it into three chapters, which will be gradually updated in the future

  • The game is completely free, please do not use it for commercial purposes

  • I am very grateful that everyone is willing to take the time to play, and I will listen carefully to everyone's opinions. Although time is limited, I will fix bugs as soon as I have time

Game Play Recording：

You can search for my name on YouTube  @linzhilong-cn

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, there will be bloody violence when attacking zombies.
